summary.span: 表示 或 上显示的可选选项。

span.span: Represents a selectable option displayed on a or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与和配合使用 来处理菜单的特殊突出显示、布局和列排列。 is a that works with and to handle the special highlighting, layout, and column arrangement for menus. 为了 显示，您必须将其添加到 或 。In order for a to be displayed, you must add it to a or . 类提供使您能够配置菜单项的外观和功能的属性。The class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item. 若要在菜单项旁显示复选标记，请使用 属性。To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the property. 使用此功能可以标识在互斥菜单项列表中选择的菜单项。Use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items. 例如，如果有一组菜单项用于设置控件中文本的颜色 ，请使用 属性来确定当前选择的颜色。For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a control, use the property to identify which color is currently selected. 使用 " 属性" 定义可按下以选择菜单项的键盘组合。Use the property to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item. 替换并扩展 已在 .Net Core 3.1 中移除的控件。 replaces and extends the control, which was removed in .NET Core 3.1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加 到的指定菜单项 。The following code example adds a to the specified menu items of a . 此代码示例是类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/VB/form1.vb#2)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false` 当且仅当 取消选中时，属性将返回。The property returns `false` if and only if the is unchecked. 从 .NET Framework 4.5.2 开始，当项被选中或不确定时，相应的图标可能会调整大小。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, when an item is checked or indeterminate, the corresponding icon may be resized. 调整大小由 "系统 DPI" 设置在 app.config 文件包含以下条目时确定：Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ToolStripMenuItem1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripMenuItem1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#495](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#495)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#495](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#495)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制或确定 是最初处于选中、未选中状态还是处于不确定状态。Use the property to control or determine whether a is initially checked, unchecked, or in an indeterminate state. 从 .NET Framework 4.5.2 开始，如果将 属性设置为 或 ，则相应的图标可能会调整大小。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the property is set to or , the corresponding icon may be resized. 调整大小由 "系统 DPI" 设置在 app.config 文件包含以下条目时确定：Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ToolStripMenuItem1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripMenuItem1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#496](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#496)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#496](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#496)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject CreateAccessibilityInstance() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateAccessibilityInstance () As AccessibleObject

summary.span: 为 创建一个新的辅助功能对象。

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for the .
A new for the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以创建可访问感知的图表控件， 并使用和 类公开可访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to create an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件将两条曲线与图例一起绘制。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`从派生的类 `ControlAccessibleObject` 在方法中用于为 图表控件提供自定义的可访问信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为图表图例不是实际的 控件，而是由图表控件绘制的，所以它不是任何内置的可访问信息。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此， `ChartControlAccessibleObject` 类会重写 方法以返回，该方法 `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` 表示图例的每个部分的可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当可访问感知的应用程序使用此控件时，控件可以提供必需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码示例是一个完整的代码示例的一部分，可在 类概述中找到。This code example is part of a complete code example that can be found at the class overview. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中重写，以配置的默认大小 。Override in derived classes to configure a default size for a . 这比在控件的构造函数中设置大小更有效。This is more efficient than setting the size in the control's constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置快捷键文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut key text.
A representing the shortcut key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可获取或设置作为快捷键显示的文本。Use this property to get or set the text that is displayed as the shortcut key. ## Examples 下面的示例将指定的文本分配给 。The following example assigns the specified text to the . 此示例是类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::Keys ShortcutKeys { System::Windows::Forms::Keys get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::Keys value); };
member this.ShortcutKeys : System.Windows.Forms.Keys with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与 关联的快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut keys associated with the .
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可为菜单命令分配键组合，如 **复制** 命令的 CTRL + C。Use the property to assign a key combination to a menu command, such as CTRL+C for the **Copy** command. 您可以使用快捷键，而不是使用快捷键，而使用快捷键，它们是菜单或菜单项中的下划线字母，用于 ALT 键。You can use shortcut keys instead of or in addition to access keys, which are underscored letters in menus or menu items used with the ALT key. 在代码中定义访问键，方法是在要用于访问键的字母前键入 "and" 符 ( # A0) 。Define access keys in code by typing an ampersand (&) before the letter you want to use for an access key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性将组合键 CTRL + P 分配给名为的菜单项 `printToolStripMenuItem` 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign the key combination CTRL+P to a menu item called `printToolStripMenuItem`. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 [如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application)。For the complete example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#100)]

exception.span: 该属性未设置为 值之一。

span.span: The property was not set to one of the values.

related.span: 如何：向 ToolStripMenuItem 添加增强功能

span.span: How to: Add Enhancements to ToolStripMenuItems
